data.meta_description: BUREAU OF INDIAN STANDARDS (Establishment Department) Subject: Seniority Lists as on 1 st January 2015 CIRCULAR Final Seniority Lists, as on 1 st January 2015, in respect of Group B and C (including upgraded
data.text:
Transcripción

1 BUREAU OF INDIAN STANDARDS (Establishment Department) Subject: Seniority Lists as on 1 st January 2015 CIRCULAR Final Seniority Lists, as on 1 st January 2015, in respect of Group B and C (including upgraded from Group D ) employees, Combined Seniority List of Section Officers and Private Secretaries, Inter-se-Seniority List of All Group D Employees and Seniority List of Matriculate Group D Employees covered under BIS (Recruitment to Administration, Finance and Other Posts) Regulations, 2007, are attached for information. Encl: As above. [N. Ravi Shankar] Director (Establishment) Our Ref: Estt-V/Seniority List Dated: 02 nd January, 2015 Circulated to: All Departments at HQ, NITS, ROs, BOs & T&Cs through BIS Intranet
